javadoc: MemoryDiff determines where the memory differs between two programs as well as the types of differences.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs an object for determining memory differences between two programs.

throws.comment:
if the program memory can't be compared because the programs
 are based on different languages.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the first program that is part of this MemoryDiff.
@return the first program
methods.name: getProgram1
methods.comment: Gets the first program that is part of this MemoryDiff.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the second program that is part of this MemoryDiff.
@return the second program
methods.name: getProgram2
methods.comment: Gets the second program that is part of this MemoryDiff.

methods.name: getNumRanges
methods.comment:
Gets the number of address ranges that the two programs memories are broken into for 
 comparing the programs.

methods.name: getRange
methods.comment:
Gets the address range as indicated by index. The index is zero based. Address ranges are
 in order from the minimum address to the maximum address range.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index of the address range to get.

methods.name: getDifferenceInfo
methods.comment: Gets the memory difference flags for the address range as indicated by index.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index of the address range to get the difference flags for.

return.comment: the difference flags for the indicated address range.

methods.name: getDifferences
methods.comment:
Gets a string representation of the types of memory differences that exist for the memory 
 block that contains the indicated address.

params.name: p1Address
params.comment: address that is obtained via the first program.

return.comment: a string indicating the types of memory differences.

methods.javadoc:
Returns an array of address ranges where there are memory differences.
@return address ranges with differences.
methods.name: getDifferentAddressRanges
methods.comment: Returns an array of address ranges where there are memory differences.

name: MemoryDiff
comment:
MemoryDiff determines where the memory differs between two programs as well as the
 types of differences.
